Donating is life changing for everyone

Your gently used clothing and items will find more than a good home. They'll create a source
of revenue to support nonprofits in your community as well as people in need abroad. And donating your things means landfills lose and the earth wins!

Environment

Thrift City Service is a textile collection company that collects for, buys from, and helps transport clothing and household items for a multitude of nonprofit organizations, and several for-profit entities.

Creating Job

The collection of reusable products allows our company to have a sustainable positive impact on the people in our communities and around the world. We provide opportunities for nonprofits & schools by supplying an outlet to sell used clothes, clothing accessories, and household items.

Community

The collection of recyclable items can either be collected by a clothing drive, or by sponsoring a branded bin. For many small, local charities, and underfunded schools these proceeds are life sustaining to their programs.
